column5: anyone no if or how you can obtain a quebec fishin license on the net? thanks in advance!
Licenses are not available over the net Below is the link to all sales outlets throughout the Province. Listing is by region.http://www.fapaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/faune...nts/region.asp

is the gov't going to offer this in the future? sure would be convenient, we've had some real issues with the language barrier in the past and this would be nice. plus some trips we don't get into quebec until late and places are closed.
